data.scheme_name: Financial Assistance for Setting up Crab Culture Unit - Proprietorship, Self Help Group, Co-operative Society - Existing
data.benefits: The scheme provides financial assistance up to Rs. 2.25 Lakhs for setting up of Crab Culture Unit, purchase of seed and feed.
data.eligibility: The applicants who are Fish Farmer/ Individual/ Registered Self Help Group/ Societies, interested in the setting up of the Crab Farming Unit in the State of Goa and resident of Goa for the last fifteen years are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions: The applicant should undergo a training programme on Crab Farming organized by the Fisheries Department/ MPEDA/ ICAR/ Other Institutes.
data.beneficiaries:
The applicants who are Fish Farmer/ Individual/ Registered Self Help Groups/ Societies/ Associations, interested in freshwater fish/prawn farming in the State of Goa are eligible under this scheme.

The applicant should be a resident of Goa for the last fifteen years.
data.prerequisites: The applicant should undergo a training programme on Crab Farming organized by the Fisheries Department/ MPEDA/ ICAR/ Other Institutes.
data.context: Sustainable and responsible increase in Fish production in the State while contributing towards social and economic growth of the Fisherâ€™s and Fish Farmers and ensuing nutritional security of the State
data.objective: To sustainably harvest Marine Fisheries resources, provide Infrastructure facilities to the Fishermen promote aquaculture and improve the Socio-economic conditions of the Fishermen and generate employment and food security in a holistic way.
data.description:
1. Scheme provides financial assistance of 25% of the actual cost for Setting Up of the Crab Culture Unit, limited to Rs. 1.50 lakhs per hectare. 
  2. The assistance can be availed for up to 2 hectares of land. Financial Assistance of 50% of the actual cost for Purchase of Seed and Feed, limited to Rs. 0.75 lakhs per hectare. 
  3. The assistance can be availed for up to 2 hectares of land.
data.how_to_apply: The applications in the prescribed format to be submitted to Directorate of Fisheries.
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefit after the approval of the application by the concerned authority.
data.checklist_info_a:
Application in Prescribed Form.
Joint Photograph of Applicant.
Survey Plan Showing Neighboring Area in Original.
Engineering Layout.
Project Report.
Affidavit.
Form 1 & Form 14 of the Proposed Land.
NOC From Local Panchayat.
Proof of Existence of the Farm in Case the Farm is an Existing Traditional Farm.
Ownership/Leased Document.
Residence Certificate of 15 Years in Goa.
Training Completion Certificate of Crab Farming From Directorate of Fisheries/MPEDA/ICAR/Any Other Institute.
Mandate Form.
data.checklist_info_c: Applicant can apply by going to nearest Directorate of Fisheries office- https://fisheries.goa.gov.in/contact-us-2/#
data.checklist_info_d: Applicant can apply by going to nearest Directorate of Fisheries office- https://fisheries.goa.gov.in/contact-us-2/#
data.beneficiary: Specific Industries - Proprietorship, Self Help Group, Co-operative Society - Goa - All MSMEs, All Non-MSMEs
data.lifecycle: Required Credit Support for Scale - Up
